Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory416.jpg'}
{3: 'After that first and last meeting—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lustrous', 3: 'I thought there would be more opposition.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lustrous looks slightly surprised.'}
{3: 'The administrative director closes the metallic clasp of the suitcase and smiles at the research director.'}
{2: 'Admin Director', 3: 'My hands would be on your neck if I was still the same person from when I first came here.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Admin Director', 3: 'Remember the first night you became the director? I dragged you out from your lab and hosted a dinner with the other directors.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Admin Director', 3: 'I asked you what you think of the base when we were eating. You said this place is like a brain constantly metabolizing.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lustrous', 3: 'I did say that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Admin Director', 3: 'It was a good metaphor.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Admin Director', 3: "Does it matter what carbon dioxide and the sodium think when they're created from metabolism?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lustrous does not hesitate.'}
{2: 'Lustrous', 3: 'Not at all. The only thing that matters is the thought.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Admin Director', 3: "That's why the nutrients go to your part of the brain. Do what you have to do.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The administrative director nods at the others around the table.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Data Director', 3: "Don't worry. We'll do our job.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lustrous looks at the directors one by one.'}
{3: 'She lets out a barely visible smile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lustrous', 3: "I'm glad to have you as my colleagues. It's an honor working with you all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Admin Director', 3: "The honor is mine. I look forward to Atlantis leading the next Industrial Revolution, but if I won't live long enough for that day to come, I'll die where it sits.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She stands.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Admin Director', 3: 'I\'ll "go" first. Try to stay away as long as you can.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Admin Director', 3: 'We are sorry that you have to be the one who carries it all at the end.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2101_5.jpg'}
{3: 'Lustrous stands in front of the window of the observatory, looking out at the lifeless seaborne city.'}
{3: 'The more one thing has shone, the more forsaken it looks when it falls.'}
{3: 'Too long has passed. Everyone she knows has passed. Now, standing here alone, she looks like a wavering torch in a storm.'}
{3: 'And this last torch is about to go out.'}
{3: 'The weather is not great today. Dark clouds cover the sky, but the rain has yet to fall. Literal silver linings are peeking from between the clouds.'}
{3: 'She closes her eyes, trying to feel the warmth on her cheeks.'}
{2: 'Lustrous', 3: 'So in the end, I still have that speck of weakness in me...'}
{2: 'Lustrous', 3: 'Oh, brain, I despise you sometimes.'}
{3: 'Lustrous sighs softly.'}
{3: 'She has never shown any weakness in front of others because she was their flag.'}

{3: "A flag is a symbol and a metaphor. A flag does not need to show humanity or have a heart. A flag just needs to be hung before an army during wars and planted on the enemy's castle after victory."}
{3: 'As long as the flag does not fall, everyone else will charge toward the same destination. As long as it stands, everyone will march forward fearlessly for their dreams and beliefs.'}
{3: 'But now, everyone she was leading is gone. They have burnt their dignity and soul into cinders for their last act for humanity.'}
{3: 'And so, the flag becomes a human again.'}
{2: 'Lustrous', 3: 'Try to stay away as long as I can...?'}
{2: 'Lustrous', 3: "I'm afraid I can't keep that promise."}
{3: 'The observatory used to be where they liked to stay the most.'}
{3: 'It sits at the top of Atlantis, and they could see the whole city from here. They could see the ocean, the sky, the stars.'}
{3: "The observatory is empty now. She is the only one left, trying to see humanity's future."}
{3: 'Lustrous walks to her chair and sits down.'}
{3: 'She has done her job. This is as far as she goes.'}
{3: 'She is tired.'}
{3: 'She will leave the rest of the work to those who come after.'}
{3: 'Lustrous turns around and takes one last look at the setting sun.'}
{3: 'Just one regret—she thinks.'}
{3: 'The day she set foot on this island, she thought she would go to the edge of the universe one day.'}
{2: 'Lustrous', 3: "Who would have thought that, in the end, I'd go gentle into that good night?"}
{3: 'Her last whisper is carried away by the wind, disappearing with the last hint of sunlight.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2101_6.jpg'}
{3: 'The moment you open the door to the observatory, you feel like you have just pressed the play button on a snapshot of the past.'}
{3: 'As the sea breeze rushes in, the room begins to fog up.'}
{3: 'The woman you have seen in the videos is sitting quietly on a chair not far from you.'}
{3: 'Her body does not look rotten. It has dried thoroughly under the same clothes you have seen in the records, easily identifiable.'}
{3: 'A heavy sense of sadness suddenly brews and fills the room.'}
{3: 'Silently, Vera walks toward the woman and kneels down on one knee.'}
{3: 'And then she discovers something.'}
{3: 'The supply crate next to the body is filled with food.'}
{3: "Vera's eyes widen."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Haha—hahaha—'}
{3: "For a moment there, she can even picture the woman's last moment from what has been left behind in the room."}
{3: 'Unlike the others, Lustrous was not starved to death. She chose to end her life.'}
{3: 'Realizing that, Vera laughs hysterically as if to cover another feeling deep inside.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'This is "as far as she goes"... Then what the hell is this?'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You tricky bastard. In the end, you couldn't take it."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Well, then. I'll seize it from you—"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Vera opens a pack of hardtacks and stuffs them in her mouth.'}
{3: 'Constructs do not need to eat. What she is doing is technically pointless.'}
{3: 'But Vera just starts stuffing the hardtacks into her mouth one after another like a ritual where she is picking up the baton.'}
{3: 'A flag being passed from Lustrous to Vera.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory418.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "If you can't take it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I will take your dreams, your future, your desires to live, your lost pain... I will take it all.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She stands up, reaches inside Lustrous\' coat, and takes out their "legacy."'}
{3: 'She gives it to you.'}
{3: 'She nods.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Stay here. I'm going spearfishing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Who knows how many things here are of use? I don't want Nikola nagging me for not trying to stop it from sinking.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, she walks away resolutely.'}
